## ‚úÖ Store Policy Compliance Checklist

I confirm this roast does NOT contain:
- [ ] Hate speech or discrimination (race, ethnicity, religion, gender, disability, age, sexual orientation)
- [ ] Harassment or bullying of individuals/groups
